captions.text: [ Screams ]
[ Bruce Wheezes ]

Now, this last enty
was a little disturbing.
[ Screams ]

- [ Grunts, Groans ]
- ''The gloves are off. God.''

''God has taken my bird
and my bush.''
[ Continues Groaning ]

''Smite me,
O mighty smiter!''
Areyou spying on me?

- Who areyou?
- l'm the one.

-Huh?
-Creator ofthe heavens
and the earth, alpha and omega.

Oh, l see
where this is going.
Bruce, l'm God.

Bingo! Yahtzee!
Is thatyour final answer?

Well, it was nice
to meetyou, God.
Thankyou for the Grand Canyon,

and good luck
with the apocalypse.

Oh, and by the way,
you suck!

You know what would've been
a little more impressive,
though?

lfyou hadn't used
the cheesy file cabinet
illusion.

Anybodywith a brain stem
can tell that that drawer...

is being fed through the wall
from the other side.

All you have to do
is find the crease,
right around here.

There is a seam here...
ora hollow spot.
[ Solid Thud ]

Where?
Through the d_all
and concrete?

[ Gasping ]
Okay. That is a good one.
That is a _ood one.

- Okay. How many fingers
am l holding up?
- Now, Bruce.
Thou shalt not tempt the Lord--

Three. Two. Four.
Nine. Six.
Eight. One.

Okay.
How many now?

- Seven.
- Aha!
[ Yelps ]
[ Gasps ]

And quite frankly,
l'm tired ofit.

When l'm backed
into a corner,
l'm like a wild animal.

l don't wanna hurtyou,
but l will, out of instinct.

since grade five,
and that was against a girl.

Yeah, but she was huge.
She had been held back.

And the sun
was in your eyes.
Oh, thereyou go.

ln a way,
l broughtyou here
to offeryou ajob.

Job? Whatjob?
Myjob.

You thinkyou can do it better,
so here's your chance.

When you leave this building,
you will be endowed
with all my powers.

[ Scoffs ]
Whateveryou say, pal.

+Steverino322 Jesus: (from Matthew 5) 27 “You have heard that it was said, 
‘You shall not commit adultery.’[e] 28 But I tell you that anyone who looks 
at a woman lustfully has already committed adultery with her in his heart." 
 
Bam.  Everyone is on their way to hell.  The good news is, that's why Jesus 
came.  He lived the life we can't, and died the death we should have, and 
suffered God's wrath in our place.  It has nothing to do with what you've 
done in your life.  It has everything to do with what HE did for YOU. All 
he asks is that you put your faith in Him.  Now isn't that better than 
trying to not fuck up and be "good enough" to avoid hell?
comments.author: heffayguap

comments.text:
+Steverino322
Religious means you are in a religion. The word has been miscued by many 
people to mean you are not "I give my life to God" but still believe in it.

All knowing means he knows all things. If we take the Christian God, we can 
point to him saying he knew you before you where born or conceived. As 
such, he would know your actions of making the universe. As I said, he 
would know if the intention was good or bad.

Also I never said much or anything about sin.

If that was the case we would not all be in hell. Because Christians 
believe he will come later on. But I wont get into the whole God thing, it 
is not a discussion needed to jump into. But the making a universe was a 
joke with plot holes. :P
comments.author: Collin Berend

comments.text:
I'm not religious but I thought the "all knowing" part meant if you did it, 
he knows. Not, if you ever even contemplated it, or even for a brief second 
thought it or questioned it, he knows and it was a sin. If that were the 
case, we'd all be going to hell.
comments.author: Steverino322

comments.text:
+Steverino322
Also it would depend on the person and what he would do with that power and 
with that new universe. If God in this movie saw nothing bad would happen 
as Bruce had a good heart and would not go to make himself the God, then I 
do not see a reason it would be a bad thing.
comments.author: Collin Berend

comments.text:
+Steverino322
 Yes he and I would. Why? Because if you are all powerful you are also all 
knowing. He would know what Bruce would do. But, what says he would no do 
it if he did not do it to directly be a God, but simply make a new 
universe. I never said he would make a new intelligent life and be named 
God. Just that he makes a new universe.

Plus, if this is the God of Abraham, yea, I would see him actually 
bestowing all the powers he has to another human and not really think about 
the end result. I really could see it happening quite easily.

Now... Morgan Freeman? Well, he will just explain your self out of 
existence and you will just fade away. No one beats Morgan Freeman.
comments.author: Collin Berend
